reviewText: The customers like leaning about pricing their home and it helps with setting the mood for the listing presentation.

This is a great tool for homeowners to understand the concept of pricing a home to sell.  It gives detailed information about the pros and cons of pricing a home and what to do to get your home sold for top dollar.  I highly recommend reviewing this video before meeting with an agent to list your home.
I give this to every seller at listing presentations, it helps them realize that pricing their home at market value is the key to a successful and quick sale.

While this is a great presentation, and one that every home seller (and real estate agent) should watch...I think $40 for this is way way way too much.  It's excellent material - I'd pay $20 for it, but not $40.
